attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I and I hope the nation wish everbody, who has benitifed from the british empire, in dedicating a national monument to Mary Seacole. I believe that her cultural status as a national hero, whom was not white, can show that all people have a gift to offer humanity. This amazing person deserves a statue as, an apology and a thank you for what she did.

rejection.details: Please make your title a call for action, not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
